item.title: Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
📸✨ Join Our Dynamic Team! 🎥🚀

Hey there! 🌟 We're a vibrant photo & video production company on the hunt for a stellar editor to join our squad! 🎨🖥️

What we're vibing for:

📷 Pro at photo editing? Rock those Photoshop & Lightroom skills!
🎞️ Got a knack for video editing? We're all about 🔥 trendy social media reels.
Why join us?

🎉 Super chill team, easy to groove with!
🌟 High-energy workspace radiating positivity and team spirit!
🔄 Potential to move from temp to full-time - if we're vibin' together!

🕗 Our hustle hours? 8am - 4pm CT timezone.

item.title: Youtube content creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and creative YouTube Content Creator to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a passion for creating engaging video content and possess a professional, clear, and captivating content work. This role requires someone who can handle the full cycle of video production, from ideation, editing, and finalizing videos for our YouTube channel.

Responsibilities:

1. Content Creation:
• Develop compelling and original content ideas for our YouTube channel.
• Write scripts for videos won't be necessary, since I make them myself
• deliver realistic AI voice recordings to ensure high-quality audio
3. Video Production:
• Record, edit, and produce high-quality videos using appropriate software and tools.
• Incorporate graphics, animations, and other multimedia elements to enhance the visual appeal of videos.
• Ensure all videos are in line with our brand guidelines and maintain a consistent aesthetic.
4. Project Management:
• Manage multiple projects simultaneously and deliver content on schedule.


Requirements:

•
• Excellent vocal skills with the ability to deliver clear, engaging, and professional AI voice-overs.
• Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere, Final Cut Pro, etc.).
• Ability to create high-quality videos from concept to completion.
• Strong attention to detail and creativity.
• Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects.
• Good communication

Preferred Qualifications:

• Experience with graphic design and animation software (e.g., After Effects, Illustrator, etc.).
• Understanding of current trends in YouTube content and digital marketing.

The 26 dollar is the highest I can go and will be for a 3-10 min youtube video ( mostly 3-8) + Viral worthy thumbnail.

Budget: $26
Posted On: June 25, 2024 19:06 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:AI-Generated Video, Documentary, Stock Footage, YouTube Shorts, YouTube Video, Video Editing
Skills: AI-Generated Video, Documentary, Stock Footage, YouTube Shorts, YouTube Video, Video Editing
Country: DEU
click to apply

item.title: MCAT Suite: Video Editor needed to create a Product Demo Video - Upwork
item.description:
I have two videos: one of me talking, and one of the product demonstration, and I just need an editor to stitch them together as well as do those cool, graphic pop-ups for when I'm speaking.

Essentially:
A minute of me talking at the camera
Two minutes of me demonstrating a product.

Those videos are done. What I would need, for the minute of me talking at the camera, is graphics and pop-ups and visuals (I have all of those). Just make it look cleaned up and professional since it's going out to a mailing list. I have the title slide as well and my brand has a color palette.

Best,
Prynce


Posted On: June 25, 2024 19:06 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Footage-Based Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Explainer Video, Video Production, Video Commercial
Skills: Footage-Based Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Explainer Video, Video Production, Video Commercial

item.title: Seeking a Creative Editor for social media video ads - Upwork
item.description:
Who are we?



We are a dynamic e-commerce company managing several international online stores. Our diverse team thrives in a remote work environment, connecting from various corners of the globe.



As we grow, we’re on the lookout for exceptional talent to join our ranks and propel us toward our objectives with greater efficiency.



Whom do we search for? We’re in need of a creative VA with a knack for editing content across our e-commerce platforms for social media video ads . Your role will be pivotal in refining our product presentations and enhancing the overall shopping experience.



Ideal Candidate:



Proven experience in creative editing for social media video ads
Familiarity with online retail in EU Markets
Proficient in using editing software and tools
Collaborative spirit and excellent communication skills
Fluent in English
To apply, please send us your portfolio. We will review submissions and schedule calls with selected candidates asap.



If this opportunity excites you, respond with #interested.



Thank you!

Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 19:05 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:AI-Generated Video, Adobe Illustrator, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Social Media Marketing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: AI-Generated Video, Adobe Illustrator, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Social Media Marketing, Video Post-Editing
Country: Morocco

item.title: Expert Video Editor Wanted for a Memorable Anniversary Photo Montage Video - Upwork
item.description:
Greetings to the video editing virtuosos out there!

I’m on the lookout for an exceptionally talented video editor to create a heartfelt and dynamic video in celebration of my parents' significant anniversary. The essence of this project is to construct more than just a slideshow; it’s about crafting an emotional and vibrant piece that tells a story, featuring over 200 treasured family photographs.

Project Requirements:

- Assemble a video ranging from 10-15 minutes in length.
- Weave together over 200 provided photos into an elegant montage.
- Craft a story that highlights the journey, memories, and milestones depicted in the images.
- Enrich the visual experience with suitable background music, smooth transitions, and engaging effects.
- Incorporate creative text overlays or captions such as names, important dates, and meaningful quotes.
- Deliver a unique and artfully edited video that distinctly stands out from AI-generated content.
- Work closely with me to integrate any specific ideas or heartfelt themes that should be brought to the forefront.
Due by July 10, 2024

Ideal Candidate:

- You should have a robust portfolio that demonstrates excellence in video editing, particularly in creating emotional and storytelling videos.
- You are proactive in communication and can effectively collaborate to bring a vision to completion.
- Proficiency with advanced video editing software like Adobe - Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or comparable tools is expected.
- A background in creating videos from photo montages with example works will strongly support your application.
- If you have skills in animation or unique graphic elements, definitely showcase these in your proposal.

Deliverables:

- A 10-15 minute Full HD video file.
- A minimum of 2 rounds of revisions to ensure the final product meets the desired outcome.

If you feel passionate about turning a collection of photos into a timeless video masterpiece that will be cherished for generations, please send through your application. I’d love to see samples of your work, especially those that highlight your ability to tell a story through a photo montage.

Let’s craft an anniversary gift that’s both stunning and meaningful!

Hourly Range: $40.00-$60.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 19:02 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Final Cut Pro, Video Editing, Photo Slideshow, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Final Cut Pro, Video Editing, Photo Slideshow, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Social media video production - Upwork
item.description:
We are a vibrant restaurant located in San Antonio, TX, and we're looking for a creative and talented Content Creator to produce 5 engaging and eye-catching social media videos for Instagram Reels. These videos will serve as promotional content for our restaurant and will be used to connect with our online audience, showcase our delicious food, and highlight our unique dining experience.

Responsibilities:

1. Conceptualize and brainstorm ideas for five Instagram Reels videos that align with our restaurant's brand and goals.
2. Plan, shoot, and edit high-quality videos that showcase our menu items, atmosphere, and special promotions.
3. Create visually appealing and attention-grabbing content that resonates with our target audience.
4. Incorporate music, captions, and other elements to enhance the overall impact of the videos.
5. Ensure that the videos are optimized for mobile viewing and adhere to Instagram's Reels guidelines.
6. Deliver the final videos in a timely manner, meeting project deadlines.

Requirements:
1. Proven experience in video content creation, particularly for social media platforms like Instagram.
2. Proficiency in video editing software such as CapCut, Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar tools.
3. A creative mindset and a keen eye for visual storytelling.
4. Access to video recording equipment and editing tools.
5. Knowledge of current social media trends and best practices.
A portfolio of previous work showcasing your video content creation skills.
6. Flexibility to work on-site at our restaurant in San Antonio, TX, for video shooting.

Please provide your portfolio and relevant experience when applying.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 25, 2024 18:40 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Video Production, Social Media Marketing
Skills: Video Production, Social Media Marketing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Looking For Youtube Expert For Faceless Channels - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a YouTube automation Expert to Manage and Grow our YouTube channels from Ground Up in selected niches for our clients.

This a complete execution project, where you will be responsible for creating the complete videos on topics provided by us.

You should have experience or a team with  :

- Voice Over Artists
- Video Editors
- Thumbnail Designers
- Researchers and Script Writers
- Expert Youtube channel Managers

This is a long-term opportunity and we will trust you with the growth and scaling of the channel.
We are looking to monetize the channel in 3-6 Months organically by producing content that aligns with YouTube guidelines.

Our main hiring parameter is results you must have result result-oriented portfolio.

Please apply only if you have experience in growing a channel from scratch to millions.

Happy to Pay $40 Per video at the start and scale to $65 per video going forward for video production

Monthly - 5-10 Videos
Duration - 8 to 10 Mins


Niches: Crime, Sports, Finance, Top 10, Korean and others.
Reference - https://www.youtube.com/@CrazyforCrime-gj9nj/videos


Hourly Range: $14.00-$50.00

item.title: Online Video Content Quality Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

We're looking for someone with a background in online video courses, educational video content, film, or movie quality assurance or creation to join our team. Your role will be to watch our content before it goes live to clients and the public, ensuring it meets our high standards of quality.

Responsibilities:

Collaborate with video editors to provide feedback on their draft deliverables, suggesting improvements as needed.
Identify opportunities for using stock footage and animations to enhance the engagement of our courses.
Detect and report any audio, transition, or slide/voice mismatches in video content.
Digest client feedback and relay it in an actionable format for video editors.
Organize raw and edited footage for lead video editors.
Time-stamp the most impactful parts of our courses for marketing material opportunities.
Serve as a creative leader, upholding our video content to the highest possible standards.
We're committed to delivering premium online courses, and we need someone to help ensure our content remains engaging and of the highest quality.

What We Offer:

A fast-growing environment with a fantastic culture.
Opportunities for long-term collaboration.
If you're passionate about video content and quality assurance, we'd love to hear from you!

Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 18:33 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Slide Animation, Video Editing, Video Production, Quality Assurance, English, Design Enhancement, Proofreading
Skills: Slide Animation, Video Editing, Video Production, Quality Assurance, English, Design Enhancement, Proofreading
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Social media manager (Reels, content creation , interactive visuals ) - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:

We are seeking a creative and dynamic Social Media Manager to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong passion for social media trends, excellent content creation skills, and the ability to produce engaging Reels and interactive visuals. You will be responsible for developing and implementing our social media strategy to enhance our online presence and improve our marketing and sales efforts.

Responsibilities:

Create, edit, and publish high-quality Reels and interactive visual content across various social media platforms (Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, etc.).
Develop and manage social media content calendars to ensure timely and consistent posting.
Monitor social media trends and adapt strategies to stay ahead of the curve.
Engage with our online community by responding to comments, messages, and interactions in a timely and professional manner.
Collaborate with the marketing team to align social media content with overall marketing goals.
Analyze and report on the performance of social media campaigns, using insights to optimize future content.
Requirements:

Proven experience as a Social Media Manager or similar role, with a strong portfolio of Reels and interactive visual content.
Proficiency in social media platforms and their respective best practices.
Excellent visual storytelling skills with the ability to create engaging and shareable content.
Strong understanding of social media metrics and the ability to analyze and interpret data.
Creative mindset with a keen eye for design and attention to detail.
Excellent communication and organizational skills.
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience with graphic design tools such as Adobe Creative Suite or Canva.
Knowledge of SEO and social media advertising.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 25, 2024 18:29 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Instagram Reels, Video Editing, Content Creation, Interactive Advertising
Skills: Instagram Reels, Video Editing, Content Creation, Interactive Advertising
Country: Bahrain
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented video editor to join our team and create dynamic highlight clips from our Unity-based racing game. Your main task will be to capture exciting moments from our races and compile them into engaging highlight videos, similar to Formula 1 race highlights.

Responsibilities:
Capture video footage from our Unity-based racing game.
Edit and compile footage into highlight clips, showcasing the most thrilling moments of the race.
Add transitions, effects, and music to enhance the viewer experience.
Ensure videos are polished, professional, and align with our brand’s style.

Requirements:
Experience with video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere, Final Cut Pro).
Familiarity with Unity and video capture within gaming environments.
Strong understanding of racing or sports highlight editing.
Creative mindset with a keen eye for detail.
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 18:29 UTC
Category: Video Editing

item.title: Hiring Photographer for Day-Long Shoot in Phoenix – Window Covering Business - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and dynamic photographer in Phoenix to capture photos and videos for our window covering business. This content will be used for our website and social media platforms. We need someone to accompany us for a full day to take pictures at well-known locations in Arizona, featuring our truck, and create a video to represent our business. The role also requires editing the captured images and video to meet our promotional needs.

If you are interested, please email us with your contact information, a brief description of your photography and video editing experience, your availability, and attach a portfolio of your work that includes both photography and videography. Join our team and help us showcase our business through your lens.

Requirements:

Proficient in photography and videography
Skilled in photo and video editing
Available to travel to various locations in Arizona for a full-day shoot
Strong communication skills

Budget: $750

Category: Local Photography
Skills:Photography, Portrait Art, Photo Editing, Videography, Photo Retouching, Adobe Photoshop, Product Photography, Video Production

item.title: Perfectly Snug Lamson Testimonial - Upwork
item.description:
Good afternoon. I recently shot some testimonial video on my iPhone and need to have it cut up for different purposes.
Ads that will appear on the Meta platform and TikTok.Social media in IG, Facebook, LinkedIn.YouTube ShortsYouTube.
Along with the video, I have created a spreadsheet for you outlining different spots on the video that we need to grab. I edited the original video down to this 8 minutes to try to make this easier for you.
Some clips are longer than they need to be so they can be shortened a little (there are notes about that on the spreadsheet) and I need for you to basically look at each clip and decide....what is most important to grab, what can be left off.
The video is 8 minutes long and I need 15 clips cut from it, with subtitles in a 9:16 format so that we can post it to all social media channels including TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn and YouTube.  I would also like a 16th edit which would be a sizzle reel under 1 minute taking the best of the 8 minutes and putting them together.

On the spreadsheet I am sending you, there is a column on how to name each clip. There is also a column where I would like to include a message in the top left hand corner of the video with a "QUESTION" that should show up as a graphic. For instance, when Louisa talks about the foot warmer funtion, the graphic would say...."Do you ever use the foot warmer?" I want it to be in quotes so it looks like we grabbed the question from a user.

I need to send you a link to a Google drive so you can grab the footage so let me know the best way to do that, I don't think I can share it on this platform? Let me know how long you think this will take if you are interested. Thanks!




Posted On: June 25, 2024 18:21 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Video Commercial, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing & Production, Video Editing, Video Animation, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Lightroom, Corporate Video, Video Production, Scriptwriting
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Video Commercial, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing & Production, Video Editing, Video Animation, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Lightroom, Corporate Video, Video Production, Scriptwriting
Country: CAN
click to apply

The video is 8 minutes long and I need 15 clips cut from it, with subtitles in a 9:16 format so that we can post it to all social media channels including TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn and YouTube.  I would also like a 16th edit which would be a sizzle reel under 1 minute taking the best of the 8 minutes and putting them together.
